institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-Specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) Operating Rules/Article 8 (Obligation to Maintain Confidentiality and Compliance with Ethics)
contents: Article 8 (Obligation to maintain confidentiality and comply with ethics) ① Deliberation committee members may not announce or leak confidential matters such as all customer information, examination results, etc. learned during deliberations related to ISC business, or use them for purposes other than work. None., ② In order to maintain confidentiality and comply with ethics in accordance with the provisions of Paragraph 1, the Corporation receives a pledge in Form No. 1, an integrity pledge in Form No. 2, and an oath of integrity in Form No. 2 from its members on an annual basis. A preliminary diagnosis of professional ethics must be requested. Revised December 31, 2019, ③ Each matter in paragraphs 1 and 2 shall apply mutatis mutandis to the members of the review committee and evaluation committee.
